name: Sweet Potato and Goat cheese
instructions:
Bake the sweet potato in the oven at 250c, for approximately 60mins, depending on the size* Cook the quinoa with miso and the other spices. Lettuce adds a crunch to the dish and makes a nice garnish.
This dish is light, tasty and nutritious!
instructions-extended: * If you wish to speed up the process, chop the sweet potato into quarters
